availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George E. Fennell (Newport, Kentucky, watchman and riverman)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, watchman and riverman. Ohio native. Son of John Fennell and Margaret Fennell. Married to Elizabeth Fennell. Father of George Fennell. Resident of Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Watchman in Newport in 1860. Reiverman in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 130. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 189. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Campbell County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 142, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
